attributes.action: Covid - The current Cabinet is not fit for purpose. I request that you resign.
attributes.additional_details: The present government and their scientific advisors have spent the last 6 months promoting fear within the populous and have used models which have continued to be unfounded in reality to achieve this. Given the wealth of genuine data examination and presentation, and backing from all professions outside of Government, it is time to have new leadership, that we may leave the current failed, bordering on deceitful, policy behind.
attributes.background: I wish the current Cabinet, including the Prime Minister, to resign in order that they may be replaced with a more balanced approach, with regard to handling the Covid-19 situation. The new Cabinet should involve backbench members from the Covid Recovery Group.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked or resign.

You might like to sign the following petition:

Hold an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557074
